name: Mixi: Clean Covid
description:
Let's clean Covid in HoChiMinh City with Mixi ! 
Use A - D to move Left - Right
Hold Left Shilft to pick up Covid

-Pick up Covid  and throw it in to disinfection car

-Don't let your health to low

-Take SpeedUP item to increase your speed

-If you pick up Convid Beta or Delta it will make you slow, but don't worry it effect  will end after 2s
